name: @tonywied17/molex-env
description: Native .menv loader with profiles, typing, and origin tracking.

scripts.publish:github: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json'));pkg.name='@tonywied17/molex-env';fs.writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2))" && npm publish --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com && git checkout package.json

author: Anthony Wiedman/Molex
